title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7210.8 - Notification to inmates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7210.8 - Notification to inmates

State Regulations

After the transfer of an inmate pursuant to this Part, the
facility administrator of the receiving facility shall provide him immediately
with a written notification of the reasons for his transfer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7210.8

Renumbered from 7300.8

New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
